title: Toys and games market : market segmentation by value 2009
summary: This statistic illustrates the global Market share of Other held by the largest Name market in the Toys in 2009 .
The company had a Market share of 30.5 % market , followed by Infant/Pre-school_toys , with a Market share of 16.2 % .
gold: This graph depicts the share of toy categories of the total market value in 2009 . Activity toys accounted for 15.1 percent of total toys and games market revenue .
